page.title: 02THE CROSS CHANNEL TUNNEL
page.content:
One of the proposed ideas for the Cross Channel Tunnel is two tunnels, each seven metres in diameter.The tunnels will have a cross pass every five hundred metres.They will be built forty metres below sea level and through the lower chalk which is impervious to water.
There will hopefully be two ways to travel,one by a shuttle service of 'coaches' which would be able to carry cars,coaches and lorries.These would be brightly lit and air conditioned. You would be able to stay in your vehicle or stand beside it.Another way would be by train.The shuttle would take thirty minutes and would have a five minute interval between each.
